thread.title: Bose launches SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II at Rs 21,150
thread.title_full: Bose launches SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II at Rs 21,150

title: Bose launches SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II at Rs 21,150
text: The new SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II's design language is similar to that of QC 25 model and are made of impact-resistant materials, glass-filled nylon and corrosion-resistant stainless steel. RELATED NEW DELHI: Premium audio products maker Bose has launched its new SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II in the Indian market. Weighing about 200 grams, the headphones are available in white and black colour variants. The new SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II's design language is similar to that of QC 25 model and are made of impact-resistant materials, glass-filled nylon and corrosion-resistant stainless steel. Bose claims that its latest wireless headphones deliver 15 hours of battery life, which is 25% more than the norm. The company says SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II can last up to two hours on just 15-minutes of charge. The headphones also come with features such as multi-point for connecting two devices, pairing via NFC, switching between music and calls, and intuitive controls and voice prompts in 11 languages to notify users of calls, connected devices and remaining battery. The headphones also offer automatic adjustment of call volume based on speech levels and changing environments. Priced at Rs 21,150, the headphones are already available online and at select authorized dealers and retail stores. http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/followceleb.cms?alias=SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II,Bose
